thread.title: Comment on Predicted Manchester United Starting XI for Manchester Derby by Anonymous

author: Anonymous
title: Comment on Predicted Manchester United Starting XI for Manchester Derby by Anonymous
text:
Tweet 
It’s that time of the week again. Time to create your own Manchester United Starting XI. The Manchester Derby kicks off tomorrow. No matter what your favorite sports book says about who is favorited in this match, United Manager Louis van Gaal believes that his side is the underdog in this one. He said so explicitly. 
As always, feel free to post your Manchester United starting XI in the comments section below. And speak your mind on the formations and line-ups already presented here for your discussion. Here’s The Sports Bank’s Manchester United starting XI Anthony Martial Ander Herrera Wayne Rooney Juan Mata Morgan Schneiderlin Michael Carrick Marcos Rojo Phil Jones Chris Smalling Matteo Darmian David De Gea
